core

Class SemiCircleChart.Data

  • java.lang.Object
    • core.SemiCircleChart.Data
  • Enclosing class:
    SemiCircleChart

    public static final class SemiCircleChart.Data
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for holding the data for SemiCircleChart, it stores the name of the data element, its value and the color of the slice that will represent it.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Data(java.lang.String name, double value)
      Creates a new Data object.
      Data(java.lang.String name, double value, javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
      Creates a new Data object with the specified color.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Data

        public Data(java.lang.String name,
            double value)
        Creates a new Data object. The color will be chosen at random, since it's not specified.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the data element.
        value - the value of the data element.

      • Data

        public Data(java.lang.String name,
            double value,
            javafx.scene.paint.Color color)
        Creates a new Data object with the specified color.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the data element.
        value - the value of the data element.
        color - the color for the slice that will represent the data element.
